## NavigateToAppOptions.path property

optional path inside application to deep link to. If undefined, will use [the app's default path](./opensearch-dashboards-plugin-core-public.app.defaultpath.md)<!-- -->\` as default.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
path?: string;
```
